page.title: 14 AN INTERVIEW
page.content: One of the residents we interviewed was Mrs Wills who has only been living in Butterleigh for a few years. However she does not feel a newcomer because everybody is so friendly. Mrs Wills told us about a stream that runs down the side of the village.Some old people can remember their grans telling them how they used to wash their clothes at the old well.When a water strike was on a year or two ago.They had to collect their water from a water lorry.Some people have their own wells so they could collect their water easily. Mrs Wills told us that either they had a water shortage or too much water sometimes. Mrs Wills enjoys walking to Tiverton with her dog through the lanes.This is about 6 miles altogether.
